properties.name: client-security-matchers
properties.description: Array of path matchers for requests to be processed with OAuth2 client configuration (sessions and login)

properties.name: client-permit-all
properties.description: Array of path matchers allowing anonymous access

properties.name: resource-server-permit-all
properties.description: Array of path matchers allowing anonymous access

properties.name: scheme
properties.description: scheme used by Spring applications (http or https)

properties.name: issuer
properties.description: Value of th iss claim in OAuth2 tokens

properties.name: client-id
properties.description: Client ID used to get OAuth2 tokens

properties.name: client-secret
properties.description: Client secret used to get OAuth2 tokens

properties.name: user-name-attribute
properties.description: Claim to use as Authentication name

properties.name: gateway-uri
properties.description: scheme host and port of the gateway

properties.name: greetings-api-uri
properties.description: scheme host and port of the greeting-api Spring application

properties.name: ui-uri
properties.description: scheme host and port of the UI application

properties.name: post-logout-redirect-uri
properties.description: Where to redirect the user after he logged out from the authorization server (probably the UI URI on the gateway)

properties.name: pre-authorization-status
properties.description: HTTP status for the 1st response in authorization_code flow, with location to the authorization server authorization endpoint

properties.name: post-authorization-status
properties.description: HTTP status for the last response in authorization_code flow, with location back to the UI
